org.apache.solr.schema
Class PrimitiveFieldType

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.solr.schema.FieldProperties
      org.apache.solr.schema.FieldType
          org.apache.solr.schema.PrimitiveFieldType
Direct Known Subclasses:
BCDIntField, BoolField, ByteField, DateField, DoubleField, FloatField, IntField, LongField, ShortField, SortableDoubleField, SortableFloatField, SortableIntField, SortableLongField, StrField, TrieField
public abstract class PrimitiveFieldType
extends FieldType

Abstract class defining shared behavior for primitive types Intended to be used as base class for non-analyzed fields like int, float, string, date etc, and set proper defaults for them
